document.full_text: the rangers and the washington capitals will not open the 2011-12 n.h.l. season in russia, nor will any n.h.l. clubs play kontinental hockey league  clubs in exhibition games in russia next fall.
document.title: n.h.l. puts freeze on games in russia
lines_and_colors: the rangers and the washington capitals will not open the 2011-12 n.h.l. season in russia, nor will any n.h.l. clubs play kontinental hockey league  clubs in exhibition games in russia next fall.
